application.doc: Set user session storage to Distributed Map

method.name: PUT
method.id: Set user session storage to Distributed Map
method.doc: Configure the storage location for data tied to the WebSphere Liberty HTTP Session that is used by the AAC/Federation runtime. This may include information related to inflight Authentication Service Requests, inflight Federated SSO flows, or any data stored against the session object in mapping rules. Note: When configured with "In Memory" persistence, no replication of session data is shared with other servers.
To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the override configs URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
